original_text: Greet Andronicus and Junia, my kinsmen and my fellow prisoners. They are well known to the apostles, and they were in Christ before me.
korean_text: 내 친척이요 나와 함께 갇혔던 안드로니고와 유니아에게 문안하라 그들은 사도들에게 존중히 여겨지고 또한 나보다 먼저 그리스도 안에 있는 자라

sentences.original_text: my kinsmen and my fellow prisoners
They are well known to the apostles
and they were in Christ before me
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 나보다 먼저 그리스도 안에 있었습니다
